charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 1873 grams of heroin. 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(A). Date of Offense: February 13, 1999. Penalty: Not less than 10 years nor more than life imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence; a fine of up to $4 million; at least 5 years SRT, a $100 special assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Ct. l: 49 mos. custody BOP. 5 yrs. SRT. Fine $100.00, Spec. Assessment $100.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 2604 grams of cocaine. 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B). Date of Offense: February 13, 1999. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence; a fine of up to $2 million; at least 4 years SRT, a $100 special assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (2)

Knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance in Schedule I and Schedule II of the controlled Substances Act of 1970, to wit: 6.5 pounds (approximate gross weight) of heroin and 5 pounds (approximate goross weight) of cocaine. 21:841(a)(1). [2:99-m-54]
